## Un peu d'interactivité pour le plaisir!

```{r map, layout = "l-page"}
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng=174.768, lat=-36.852, popup="Là où R est né") %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.Watercolor)
```


## Peut-être que ça vous inspirera!

```{r plotly}
library(plotly)
library(gapminder)
df <- gapminder

fig <- df %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~ gdpPercap,
    y = ~ lifeExp,
    size = ~ pop,
    color = ~ continent,
    frame = ~ year,
    text = ~ country,
    hoverinfo = "text",
    type = 'scatter',
    mode = 'markers',
    width = "100%",
    height = 600
  )

fig <- fig %>% layout(xaxis = list(type = "log"))

fig <- fig %>%
  animation_button(
    x = 0, xanchor = "left", y = -0.15, yanchor = "bottom"
  )

fig
```
